All fields are validated to ensure that no fields are empty, and that the selected appointment start/end times are within business hours.

onDeleteAppt(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.shaffer.HomeController
When an appointment is selected in the Appointment table, the appointment is deleted when 'Delete' is clicked.
onDeleteCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.shaffer.HomeController
When a customer is selected in the Customer table, the customer is deleted when 'Delete' is clicked.

Function to lead the user back to the Home Page.
onLogin(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.shaffer.LoginController
Records the login attempt to login_activity.txt, regardless if the attempt was successful or a failure.
onLogout(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.shaffer.HomeController
Logs the current user out; returns the user to the login page to enter credentials again.

When a Contact is selected, the getContactSchedule() method is called.
